casebody.data:
STATE
v.
James Albert COLEY, Jr. No. 399P06-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 8, 2007. Kathleen U. Baldwin, Assistant Attorney General, Roxann Vaneekhoven, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st day of August 2007 by Defendant for Relief:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 8th day of November 2007."
